item.title: Version 2.3.10
item.description:
[2.3.10] - 2026-02-09

Added

  • Quick Add Dialog: Search and place gates by name (Cmd/Ctrl+E)
  • Fuzzy search across all available gate categories
  • Keyboard-driven: type, arrow-key select, Enter to place
  • ESC cancels cleanly without ghost gates
  • Docked Oscilloscope: Oscilloscope is now a bottom panel instead of a floating window
  • Toggle via View → Oscope (Ctrl+G) with a draggable splitter
  • Toolbar with add/remove signal buttons, pause/reset, export, load/save layout
  • Signal list replaces the old combo box grid — add signals from a popup menu, remove with one click
  • Native macOS UI:
  • SF Symbol icons throughout the toolbar (adapts to light/dark mode automatically)
  • Native tab bar using wxNotebook instead of wxAuiNotebook
  • Gate parameters dialog presented as a native sheet
  • Redesigned sidebar with improved scroll height
  • Shift+Paste: Hold Shift while pasting a TO/FROM gate to keep the original junction name (bypasses auto-increment)

Fixed

  • Use-after-free crash in guiGate destructor during palette rendering
  • Memory leaks across the codebase: command destructors, gate hotspots, GL context, print data, circuit teardown
  • Memory leak in paste clipboard logic (heap-allocated string never freed)
  • SF Symbol toolbar icons rasterizing into bitmaps on toggle (now patches NSButton directly via Cocoa)
  • Oscilloscope export on Retina displays (viewport mismatch caused partial capture)
  • Off-by-one buffer overrun in GL-to-image export (glToImage.cpp)
  • ESC key not canceling quick add on Windows
  • Quick add focus issues after modal dialog on macOS

Changed

  • Oscilloscope rewritten: wxFrame → wxPanel, combo boxes → list + toolbar, encoding hacks removed
  • Sidebar layout improved with better gate picker scroll area

Full Changelog: https://github.com/taciturnaxolotl/CedarLogic/compare/v2.3.9...v2.3.10
